Jobs.title: Head of Project Services
Jobs.description: ', 'ASP.net, c#, sql server development environment.', 'My primary focus was to improve Project communication between project team members and to introduce the Project Management discipline to the organisation, both of which were achieved. Cloudcity produce white labelled online trivia games which can be branded according to individual business alliance requirements and these games are used as a viral marketing tool. Cloudcity also have their own core product set which to date includes Football Trivia, Movie Trivia and Sci-Fi Trivia. ', '', 'The primary Project Management methodology used at Cloudcity was based on Agile development using SCRUM. I also introduced elements of the Waterfall approach to Project Management where applicable for example issue and risk logs.', '

Jobs.title: eCommerce Project Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'Project Manager on large ecommerce systems within a matrix management organisation.', 'Responsible for implementation of Online Payment Solutions (Alternative Payment Methods such as Neteller, Earthport, eNets, Entropay, 1-Pay as well as the Datacash payment gateway from Ladbrokes) for 2.5 years. ', 'Responsible for leading and managing the implementation of an IT Governance Product - Mercury ITG - (Demand Management, Project Management, Programme Management, Resource Management) for 2.5 years. Responsible for process analysis, process design, process development, dashboard development, product training, product support. Developed processes for Systems Change Requests, Small/Medium/Large Project requests, Bug, Issue and Scope Change requests.', '
